Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

constructor.custom:error: Throws ZeroAddressNotAllowed if the CorePoolComptroller or RiskStewardReceiver addresses are zero
constructor.details: Sets the immutable CorePoolComptroller and RiskStewardReceiver addresses and disables initializers

initialize(address,uint256).custom:error: Throws InvalidMaxDeltaBps if the max delta bps is 0 or greater than MAX_BPS
initialize(address,uint256).details: Initializes the contract as ownable, access controlled, and pausable. Sets the max delta bps initial value.

params.accessControlManager_: The address of the access control manager

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

processUpdate((uint256,bytes,string,byte.custom:error: OnlyRiskStewardReceiver Thrown if the sender is not the RiskStewardReceiverUnsupportedUpdateType Thrown if the update type is not supportedUpdateNotInRange Thrown if the update is not within the allowed range
processUpdate((uint256,bytes,string,byte.custom:event: Emits SupplyCapUpdated or BorrowCapUpdated depending on the update with the market and new cap

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setMaxDeltaBps(uint256).custom:error: InvalidMaxDeltaBps if the max delta bps is 0 or greater than MAX_BPS
setMaxDeltaBps(uint256).custom:event: Emits MaxDeltaBpsUpdated with the old and new max delta bps

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

__gap.details: This empty reserved space is put in place to allow future versions to add new variables without shifting down storage in the inheritance chain. See https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/4.x/upgradeable#storage_gaps

InvalidMaxDeltaBps().notice: Thrown when a maxDeltaBps value of 0 is set

OnlyRiskStewardReceiver().notice: Thrown when the update is not coming from the RiskStewardReceiver

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

UnsupportedUpdateType().notice: Thrown when an update type that is not supported is operated on

UpdateNotInRange().notice: Thrown when the new value of an update is out of range

ZeroAddressNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied address is a zero address where it is not allowed

BorrowCapUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a borrow cap is updated

MaxDeltaBpsUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the max delta bps is updated

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

SupplyCapUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a supply cap is updated

BORROW_CAP().notice: The update type for borrow caps

CORE_POOL_COMPTROLLER().notice: Address of the CorePoolComptroller used for selecting the correct comptroller abi

RISK_STEWARD_RECEIVER().notice: Address of the RiskStewardReceiver used to validate incoming updates

SUPPLY_CAP().notice: The update type for supply caps

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

maxDeltaBps().notice: The max delta bps for the update relative to the current value

processUpdate((uint256,bytes,string,byte.notice: Processes a market cap update from the RiskStewardReceiver. Validates that the update is within range and then directly update the market supply or borrow cap on the market's comptroller.

userdoc.notice: Contract that can update supply and borrow caps received from RiskStewardReceiver. Requires that the update is within the max delta. Expects the new value to be an encoded uint256 value of un padded bytes.
